body:
So many rumors have been going around about a change in the donor perks, or user benefits changing.
I'm sure many others are wondering what is really happening, I have no clue, but if someone with authority, or insight could tell us whats happening on the first of august (tomorrow)that would be greatly appreciated.
thanks,
Dom

replies.body: I would like to know to be honest and I feel like we deserve to know since it was our money we spent. Don't get me wrong I don't want a refund but I would like to know what is being done about it.
replies.body_tagged: I would like to know to be honest and I feel like we deserve to know since it was our money we spent. Don't get me wrong I don't want a refund but I would like to know what is being done about it.

replies.body:
Your rank will be purely for aesthetics and fun, anything that gives a donator an advantage etc. premium kits or xp boosts in a kitted minigame (nebula may still have xp boost because it has no kits)
so all the gameplay changing aspects will be removed, they may be replaced with trails, pets or hats in the lobby.
replies.body_tagged:

so all the gameplay changing aspects will be removed, they may be replaced with trails, pets or hats in the lobby.

replies.body: The xp boost must go as it directly affects gameplay (pretty sure Mojang mentioned donator multipliers in one of their statements). It allows donators to unlock kits faster. The donator kits obviously will have to be dropped. I think Avicus will be relatively untouched, so yay. Just worried about other servers.
